name: DeliSpace
description:
Game made for Trijam - 3 hour game jam. Music/Sounds: Pixabay, CC-0.
Theme: package delivery.
Diversifier: 8bit.
Fullscreen recommended.

First day, huh? Don't worry, it's not a hard job... yet. Grab a package, deliver it to a recipient, come back for another one. Easy? Easy.

Deliver a package in a mint condition to earn bonus points. Bump it into asteroids two times and... receiver won't be happy. This will permanently damage our reputation and eventually lead to your dismissal.

Control vehicle by using W S A D. It may be tricky at first, but hey, you got this. Good luck!
